alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:33AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...An area of thunderstorms with heavy downpours will impact portions of southern Plymouth, southern Bristol, east central Washington, Newport, east central Kent, eastern Providence and Bristol Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 433 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of thunderstorms with heavy downpours along a line extending from 6 miles west of Gosnold to 6 miles south of Charlestown. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Warwick, Plymouth, East Providence, Dartmouth, South Kingstown, North Kingstown, Newport, Bristol, Marion, Middleborough, Wareham, Somerset, Portsmouth, Barrington, Middletown, Fairhaven, Narragansett and Swansea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington
